architectural_notes: User requested to avoid spending their credits while fixing issues (pause builds until confirmation / only make targeted changes).
known_issues: Sidebar is overlapping content in the UI layout.
Calendar component is overlapping content in the UI layout.
On the Master Design page, clicking Karigar List causes overlapping UI.
On the Master Design page, clicking Action List causes overlapping UI.

existing_features.title: Fix the global layout so the navigation/sidebar (including the mobile left Sheet menu) never overlaps or obscures page content across routes and viewport sizes.

Fix the date-picker (calendar) popovers so they do not overlap surrounding UI or each other, and ensure only one calendar popover can remain open at a time in date filter UIs (e.g., From Date vs To Date).

Fix the Master Designs page overlap issues so that opening the Karigar List and any action menus/lists does not overlap or collide with the page layout (header/actions area, filter badge row, search row, card content, and table).
